title: Kaya Kaya Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Take-out, Bakery
description: A western-style vegetarian cafe offering breakfast, lunch and dinner. On the menu are a mix of American and Italian fare, from fresh salad, sandwiches, and wraps to thin pizza, risotto, and pasta. Vegan dessert options include a red bean brownie cake, cashew key lime cheesecake, house-made coconut sorbet with caramelized pineapple, and banana flax seed muffin. Opened summer 2014 and converted to all-veg in summer 2015.
streetAddress: 6, Alley 19, Lane 216, Sec. 4, Zhongxiao East Rd,  Daâ€™an District
